entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and early this afternoon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
